original_title: John en Marsha Tnt sa Amerika
overview: Struggling to make ends meet, John (Dolphy) decides to seek his fortune in the United States, with son Rolly (Rolly Quizon) in tow. After narrowly avoiding deportation, he takes a job in a factory, unaware that it's a front for one of the country's biggest drugs.
title: John en Marsha Tnt sa Amerika
